required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study of CellCept (Mycophenolate Mofetil) Versus Mycophenolate Sodium in Kidney Transplant Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Pharmocokinetics of Mycophenolate Mofetil and Enteric Coated Mycophenolate Sodium in Calcineurininhibitor-free Treated Patients After Renal Transplantation

brief_summary.textblock: This open-label, 2-arm study will compare the pharmacokinetics of CellCept and mycophenolate sodium in kidney transplanted patients on a calcineurininhibitor-free mycophenolic acid-based therapy. On the study day patients will take their prescribed medication (either CellCept or mycophenolate sodium). Blood samples will be drawn directly before and at intervals up to 12 hours after intake of the study medication. Anticipated time on study treatment is 12 hours and target sample size is 24.

primary_outcome.description: The mean mycophenolic acid (MPA) concentration in plasma was determined (in milligrams per liter [mg/L]) from blood samples collected predose (immediately before receiving study treatment).

Dose normalized C0 was determined (in mg/L) from blood samples collected predose. Both MMF and EC-MPS doses were normalized to a standard dose of 1 g MMF or 720 mg EC-MPS, respectively. The dose normalization was calculated as follows: For the MMF group: Dose normalized C0 equals (=) C0 divided by (/) (actual dose taken/1000) For the EC-MPS group: Dose normalized C0 = C0 / (actual dose taken/720)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and postdose at 30 and 60 minutes and 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 10 and 12 hours
primary_outcome.description: The mean minimum MPA concentration in plasma was determined (in mg/L) from blood samples collected predose and postdose on Day 1.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and postdose at 30 and 60 minutes and 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 10 and 12 hours
primary_outcome.description: Dose-normalized Cmin was determined (in mg/L) from blood samples collected predose and postdose. Both MMF and EC-MPS doses were normalized to a standard dose of 1 g MMF or 720 mg EC-MPS, respectively. The dose normalization was calculated as follows: For the MMF group: Dose normalized Cmin = Cmin/ (actual dose taken/1000) For the EC-MPS group: Dose normalized Cmin = Cmin / (actual dose taken/720)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and postdose at 30 and 60 minutes and 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 10 and 12 hours
primary_outcome.description: The mean maximum MPA concentration in plasma was determined (in mg/L) in blood samples collected predose and postdose on Day 1.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and postdose at 30 and 60 minutes and 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 10 and 12 hours
primary_outcome.description: Dose-normalized Cmax in plasma was determined (in mg/L) from blood samples collected predose and postdose on Day 1. Both MMF and EC-MPS doses were normalized to a standard dose of 1 g MMF or 720 mg EC-MPS, respectively. The dose normalization was calculated as follows: For the MMF group: Dose normalized Cmax = Cmax / (actual dose taken/1000) For the EC-MPS group: Dose normalized Cmax = Cmax / (actual dose taken/720)

primary_outcome.measure: MPA Area Under the Curve From 0 to 12 Hours (AUC0-12)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and postdose at 30 and 60 minutes and 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 10 and 12 hours
primary_outcome.description: The mean MPA AUC0-12 in plasma was determined (in mg multiplied by hours, per Liter [mg*h/L]) from blood samples collected predose and postdose on Day 1.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and postdose at 30 and 60 minutes and 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 10 and 12 hours
primary_outcome.description: Dose-normalized MPA AUC0-12 in plasma was determined (mg*h/L) from blood samples collected predose and postdose on Day 1. Both MMF and EC-MPS doses were normalized to a standard dose of 1 g MMF or 720 mg EC-MPS, respectively. The dose normalization was calculated as follows: For the MMF group: Dose normalized MPA AUC = MPA AUC / (actual dose taken/1000) For the EC-MPS group: Dose normalized MPA AUC = MPA AUC / (actual dose taken/720)

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants By Time to Maximum Plasma Concentration (Tmax)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and postdose at 30 and 60 minutes and 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 10 and 12 hours

secondary_outcome.measure: Regression Coefficients For Participants Receiving MMF
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at 30 minutes and 1 and 2 hours postdose
secondary_outcome.description: The estimated regression coefficients for participants who received MMF presented in milligrams per liter (mg/L).

arm_group.description: Participants received mycophenolate mofetil (MMF) orally (PO) at a dose of 1 gram per day (g/day) twice daily (BID), and prednisone, PO, up to 5 milligrams per day (mg/day) for at least 1 month.
Participants received mycophenolate sodium (EC-MPS), PO, at a dose of 720 mg/day BID, and prednisone PO up to 5 mg/day for at least 1 month.

intervention.description: 1 g per day b.i.d. p.o. for at least 1 month
720 mg b.i.d. p.o. for at least 1 month

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- adult patients, >/=18 years of age
- kidney transplantation >/=6 months ago
- on mycophenolic acid-based, calcineurininhibitor-free therapy for >/=3 months, >/=1 month on stable dose
- co-therapy with 5mg prednisone for >/=1 month
Exclusion Criteria:
- active gastrointestinal ulcus
- severe diarrhea od gastrointestinal disease
- severe impairment of renal function
- current malignancy
- Lesch-Nyhan- or Kelley-Seegmiller-Syndrome

group.title: Mycophenolate Mofetil (MMF)/Prednisone
group.description: Participants were administered MMF tablets or capsules, orally (PO), at a dose prescribed by their physician and prednisone up to 5 milligrams (mg) PO on Day 1.

group.title: Enteric-coated Mycophenolate Sodium (EC-MPS)/Prednisone
group.description: Participants were administered EC-MPS tablets, PO, at a dose prescribed by their physician and prednisone up to 5 mg PO on Day 1.

baseline.population: The pharmacokinetic (PK) population included all randomized participants.

group.title: MMF/Prednisone
group.description: Participants were administered MMF tablets or capsules, PO, at a dose prescribed by their physician and prednisone up to 5 mg PO on Day 1.

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: Pre-dose Trough Concentration (C0)
outcome.description: The mean mycophenolic acid (MPA) concentration in plasma was determined (in milligrams per liter [mg/L]) from blood samples collected predose (immediately before receiving study treatment).
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic (PK) population: all participants who took study drug and for whom all defined blood samples at the planned sampling time points were available.

The dose normalization was calculated as follows: For the MMF group: Dose normalized C0 equals (=) C0 divided by (/) (actual dose taken/1000) For the EC-MPS group: Dose normalized C0 = C0 / (actual dose taken/720)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The Study being conducted under this Agreement is part of the Overall Study. Investigator is free to publish in reputable journals or to present at professional conferences the results of the Study, but only after the first publication or presentation that involves the Overall Study. The Sponsor may request that Confidential Information be deleted and/or the publication be postponed in order to protect the Sponsor's intellectual property rights.
